attributes.action: TOEIC allegation "Justified", give us legal stay in UK.
attributes.background: Now please give all TOEIC victim a LEGAL STAY in UK as we have justified our allegation. We have been in UK for 8 years and wasted our thousands of fortunes, our careers spoiled, got into depression, haven't seen our parents since many years. Please allow us to be legal and a tax payer in UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by justifying your allegation or exactly what you mean by giving "TOEIC victims" a "legal stay".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
